Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrm1st3r.cards.game.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BluetoothPlayer, LocalPlayer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class describes a card player.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergius Maier
